mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY st_type ORDER BY st_num DESC) AS row_num FROM STORETEST ) AS sub WHERE row_num <= 4 ORDER BY st_type, row_num;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTTEST (member_num, st_num, cart_quantity, cart_date) VALUES (#{member_num}, #{st_num}, #{cart_quantity}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_num, c.member_num, c.st_num, c.cart_quantity, c.cart_date, s.st_name, s.st_price FROM CARTTEST c JOIN STORETEST s ON c.st_num = s.st_num WHERE c.member_num = #{member_num} ORDER BY c.cart_date DESC
